topics.body:
Hey guys just curious here, but I got asked this funny question on a WoW forum, in the unlikely event you find yourself in the company of Night Elves, would you:

A. Hit on the first hot elf babe you see? 

B. Act like a gentlemen in a strange place.

C. Freak out at the fact you somehow teleported from your home to a magical place that supposed to not exist. 

Or D. Cover your boner from the elves the moment you realize you were jacking off at the thought of having sex with elves? :D
